ShortDescription.Value: Removes the need for garbage services.

Publish.LongDescription:
## Magic Garbage Truck
### Updated for 1.3.6* and Bridges DLC
This mod removes the need to place garbage handling buildings in your city.
### Option 1: Total Magic - All garbage is instantly removed from the city as soon as it is generated. - Just set it and forget it! (like traditional magic garbage) - Trucks and buildings are purely cosmetic.
### Option 2: Semi-Magic - Magic Slider to greatly increase capacity of Super Trucks. - Choice for players who like to see some garbage trucks driving around. - Over-powered garbage services to reduce traffic and garbage buildup.
### Compatibility - This mod works with new and existing saves; safe to remove at any time. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection; lightweight, compatible, and less likely to break with game updates.
### Credits - RiverMochi - author and maintainer - Thanks to Wayz for inspiration on the original Magical Garbage mod - Necko1996 - testing
